text: this is Texas the biggest state in the

plagued by a big problem
children being separated from their

Texas Civil Rights Project to help bring

conviction that especially the people
who are in the most vulnerable
situations need the best possible legal
representation
my name is afrinolly virus I am 36 years

individuals and organizations who are
victims of civil rights and human rights
violations with the passage of time I
have become more and more convinced that
this is the right thing for me to do
this fans you know sits on what probably

trying to take additional land from
hundreds of landowners to build more of
this and its lands that have been in

these are my two sisters here in the
back standing behind me
Luisa Cavazos was our grandma in the

it's more about our ancestors leaving us

those people yeah at this point we had

this is what we're going to give you for

and if we don't that's why that's what
every scum
got invited without him I don't I don't

we don't have the money to get a big

were a few moments more than one for
sure where we felt helpless when we
would see you know ten family separated
today and then 15 more and 25 more the

like there was no ending to it when the

we had the skills and the capacity and
the human capital to do something about

and I think for many families we made
the world of a difference for hundreds
of them we got on their kids back and
I'm not saying that everyone needs to
dedicate their life to human rights or
the public interest issues but we all
certainly have some skills and at least
some time that we can dedicate to help
those around us those closest to us it
can be our family our neighbors anyone
that is in our fear of influence that we
can do a little bit to help them so in
